text: Dennis James Kennedy (or D. James Kennedy, November 3, 1930 - September 5, 2007) was an American televangelist and megachurch pastor. He started Coral Ridge Presbyterian Church in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and was the senior pastor there from 1960 until his death in 2007. He began Coral Ridge Ministries in 1974. == Other websites == *Coral Ridge Presbyterian Church website *Coral Ridge Ministries website *D. James Kennedy's Memorial Tribute website *Truths That Transform daily radio broadcast on OnePlace.com * Category:1930 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American Presbyterian ministers Category:People from Augusta, Georgia Category:Television evangelists
title: D. James Kennedy
